text: civaraku ma ajna vaccindi mariyu poyyi pongindi (jala pravahalu bhumini cilcukoni rasagayi). Appudu memu (nuh to) annamu: "Prati jati (pasuvula) nundi rendu (ada maga) jantalanu mariyu ni kutumbam varini - idi varake sucincabadina vadu tappa - mariyu visvasincina varini, andarini daniloki (navaloki) ekkincuko!" Atanini visvasincina varu kondaru matrame
